LSTM - LSTM - Bias.from sentence: It can be seen that our method , LSTM - LSTM - Bias , outperforms all other methods in F 1 score and achieves a 3 % improvement in F 1 over the best method CoType .

LSTM - LSTM model.from sentence: We also find that the LSTM - LSTM model is better than LSTM - CRF model based on our tagging scheme .

compared with.from sentence: When compared with the traditional methods , the precisions of the end - to - end models are significantly improved .
